body:
More like tan history.... Also the character designs are hot but they all look the same in all this author   stories... For example the long  black haired chick with the rack always the female lead... the second side girl  always the  brown haired bob cut....

I'd like to see some new character designs..  doesn't even have to be big but man change the hair color or something...
LIES!!! This is ain't what the BLM folks stands for! No people of color in here
What a great brother, willing to be sex offender just to help with his sister's love life.
Why do all the guys look like they are perpetually about to sneeze?
this author man.. lol cant make any decent happy endings or wholesome series
